ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary: The Black Cat has Edgar Allan Poe tied up and has a pendulum with a boot on it to kick him in the posterior.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-30 12:23:35. [CVDB703977] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 16:24:20. [Issue ID 1940221]
